tool_description: Tracks and monitors the status of volunteer opportunity listings across multiple platforms in real-time.

listing_id.description: ID of the volunteer listing to track

check_frequency.description: How often to check status in minutes (5-1440)

include_metrics.description: Whether to include engagement metrics in status updates

error_messages: Invalid listing ID: The provided listing_id does not exist or was not published.
Invalid check frequency: check_frequency must be between 5 and 1440 minutes.
Platform access denied: Cannot access status information for one or more platforms.
No published listings found: The listing has not been successfully published to any platform.
Status check failed: Unable to retrieve current status from platform APIs.
usage: Provide listing_id to track publication status. Adjust check_frequency based on monitoring needs. Enable include_metrics for comprehensive tracking.

overall_status.description: Overall publication status across all platforms

active_platforms.description: Number of platforms where listing is currently active
